location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘File 2/27 British Consulate Muscat Air Facilities on the Arab Coast’

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 22; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Government of India's External Affairs Department, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf and the Political Agent, Muscat regarding the facilities granted by the Government of Muscat and Oman to the Royal Air Force before the signing of the Muscat Civil Air Agreement in October 1934.The file also includes letters from the British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC) to the Political Resident, Bahrain which contain information about its Baghdad-Bahrain trips.
